"A World Engulfed In Shadows":
"Corrupted Areas have been appearing on
multiple planets, starting with Naberius.
Hostile readings have been emerging
within these areas.
Your mission is to repel them wherever
they appear. Form a small elite squad and
investigate this phenomenon, defeating
anything you encounter.
――――――――――――――――――――
Defeat the enemies on each planet."

"You're about to be transferred
to the Corrupted Forest area
of planet Naberius!"

"We're picking up spatio-
temporal distortion on a level
we've never seen before...
Be very careful out there."
"Planet Amduscia: Corrupted Area: Volcanic Caves - Area 3"
